SA20n1319:3: iha bodhisattvo manāpāṃ satyāṃ dharmyāñcārthopasaṃhitāñca sattveṣu vācamudāharati |
SA20n1319:7: iha bodhisattvasya yā vāksammodanī yayā vācā bodhisattvo vigatabhṛkuṭiḥ pūrvābhilāpī uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitamukha pūrvaṅgamaḥ kṣemasvastyayanaparipṛcchayā vā dhātusāmyaparipṛcchayā vā sukharātrindivaparipṛcchayā vā ehīti svāgata [vādi] tayā vā ityevamādibhirākāraiḥ sattvān pratisammodayati lokayātrāṃ nāgarakabhāvamanuvartamānaḥ |
SA20n1319:8: yā ca vāgbodhisattvasyānandanī yayā vācā bodhisattvaḥ putravṛddhiṃ [dāravṛddhiṃ] jñātivṛddhiṃ dhanavṛddhiṃ dhānyavṛddhiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā apratisaṃviditātmavṛddhikānāṃ sattvānāmāvedayannānandayati śraddhāśīlaśrutatyāgaprajñāvṛddhyā vā punarānandayati |
SA20n1319:9: yā ca bodhisattvasya sarvākāraguṇopetadharmadeśanāpratisaṃyuktā vāk sattvānāṃ hitasukhāya satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitā parameṇopakāreṇopakāribhūtā |
SA20n1319:10: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ priyavāditā prabhedaśaḥ sarvā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:11: tatra katamā bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ sarvā priyavāditā |
SA20n1319:14: tatra yā ca sammodanīvāg yā cānandanī iyaṃ lokayātrānugatā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:15: tatra yeyaṃ vāgupakarā parameṇopakāreṇa pratyupasthitā nirdiṣṭā iyaṃ samyagdharmadeśanānugratā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:18: yadbodhisattvo vadhakeṣu pratyarthiṣu pratyamitreṣu suviśuddhena niṣkaluṣeṇa cetasā pratisaṃkhyāya sammodanīṃ vā ānandanīṃ vā upakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:19: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ adhimātraṃ saṃmūḍheṣu sattveṣu dhandhendriyeṣvaparitasyamānaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati khedamabhyupagamya grāhayati nyāyaṃ dharmaṃ kuśalam iyaṃ dvitīyā bodhisattvasya duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:20: punaryadbodhisattvaḥ śaṭheṣu māyāviṣu sattveṣvācāryopādhyāyagurudakṣiṇīyavisaṃvādakeṣu mithyāpratipanneṣu anāghātacitto'pratighacittaḥ sammodanīmānandanīmupakarāṃ vācamudīrayati iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tṛtīyā duṣkarā priyavāditā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:25: pramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ gṛhi-pravrajitānāṃ samyaksaṃcodanā pramādacaryāyā utthāpya apramādacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanārtham |
SA20n1319:29: iha bodhisattvabhūtāstathāgatabhūtāśca bodhisattvāḥ sanidānameva vineyānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti saniḥsaraṇaṃ sapratisaraṇaṃ saparākramaṃ saprātihāryam |
SA20n1319:34: caturbhiḥ pratisaraṇaiḥ saṃgṛhītāmaviparītāṃ dharmavinaye'smin pratipattiṃ prajñapayanti |
SA20n1319:41: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā |
SA20n1319:50: pareṣāṃ sarvopakaraṇairalpotsukatāyāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu ca samyaggateṣvalpotsukatāyāṃ viśadapravāraṇī priyavāditā |
SA20n1319:53: akuśalāt sthānād vutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭa-śruta-pariśaṅkita-saṃcodanāvasādanī priyavāditā |
SA20n1319:55: iyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ trayodaśākārā priyavāditā sarvākārā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:58: yā bodhisattvasya caturvidhāṃ vāgviśuddhiṃ niśrityāṣṭaskāryeṣu vyavahāreṣu vāk |
SA20n1319:64: dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭavāditā śrute mate vijñāte vijñātabāditā |
SA20n1319:72: śīlasaṃpade dṛṣṭisaṃpade ācārasaṃpade ājīvasaṃpade ca yā priyavāditā saddharmadeśanā |
SA20n1319:77: tatrārthacaryā yathaiva priyavāditā tathaiva vistareṇa veditavyā |
SA20n1319:79: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvaprakārayā'nayā priyavāditayā tatra-tatropagamārthaṃ sattvānāmācarati |
SA20n1319:81: evaṃ priyavāditayā yuktisaṃdarśitānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāyogaṃ śikṣāsvarthacaryāyāṃ dharmānudharmapraticaryāyāṃ kāruṇyacittamupasthāpya nirāmiṣeṇa cetasā samādāpanā vinayanā niveśanā pratiṣṭhāpanā |
SA20n1319:91: tatra dhārmikaiḥ karmaguṇaiḥ bhogānāmarjana-rakṣaṇa-vardhana-samyak-samādāpanatayā dṛṣṭadhārmike'rthe samādāpanā veditavyā |
SA20n1319:92: yenāyaṃ parataśca praśaṃsāṃ labhate dṛṣṭe ca dharmai sukham |
SA20n1319:96: yenāyaṃ niyataṃ saṃparāyasukhito bhavati na tvavaśyaṃ dṛṣṭe dharme |
SA20n1319:97: tatra yā gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vānupūrveṇa vairāgya-gamana-samādāpanā |
SA20n1319:99: yenāyaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme prasrabdha-kāya prasrabdha-cittaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati |
SA20n1319:105: tathā hi te duḥkhasamādāpyā bhavanti kuśale |
SA20n1319:106: mahatyāṃ bhogasaṃpadi vartamāneṣu sattveṣu tadadhyavasānagateṣvarthacaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā |
SA20n1319:107: tathāhi te mahati pramādapade pramādasthāne vartante |
SA20n1319:108: ito bāhyakeṣu tīrthikeṣu pūrvaṃ [ca] tīrthika dṛṣṭicariteṣu sattveṣvarthaṃcaryā bodhisattvānāṃ duṣkarā |
SA20n1319:109: tathā hi te svayaṃ saṃmūḍhāścābhiniviṣṭāścāsmin dharmavinaye |
SA20n1319:112: iha bodhisattvaḥ aśrāddhaṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati |
SA20n1319:113: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi samādāpayati yāvatpratiṣṭhāpayati |
SA20n1319:122: sā ṣaḍvidhā saptavidhā caikadhyamabhisakṣipya trayodaśavidhā draṣṭavyā |
SA20n1319:123: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃgrahītavyāṃśca sattvān samyak saṃgṛhṇāti |
SA20n1319:127: avatīrṇāśca sattvān samyak triṣu yāneṣu paripācayati |
SA20n1319:131: yathā sambhārarakṣopacaye evaṃ praviveke cittaikāgratāyāmāvaraṇaviśudau manaskārabhāvanāyāṃ ca sanniyojayati |
SA20n1319:137: yathā āhrīkyaparyavasthānamevamapatrapitavyeṣu anapatrāpyaparyavasthānaṃ middhaparyasthānamauddhatyaparyavasthānaṃ kaukṛtyaparyaṃvasthānamīrṣāparyasthānaṃ [mātsaryaparyavasthānaṃ] vinodayatyapanayati |
SA20n1319:155: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānna duścaritavyāmiśre duścaritapūrvagame sāvadye sakliṣṭe'kuśale sanniyojayati |
SA20n1319:157: punarbodhisattvo nāmokṣe cānekāntaviśuddhe cāyatane mokṣa eṣa ekāntaviśuddha eṣa iti sattvāṃstatraiva samādāpayati |
SA20n1319:159: punarbodhisattvaḥ pūrvaṃ bālaprajñānāṃ sattvānāmuttānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti |
SA20n1319:161: madhyaprajñāścainā viditvā madhyāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ sūkṣmāmavavādānuśāsanīmanupravartayati anupūrveṇa kuśalapakṣasamudāgamāya |
SA20n1319:167: punarbodhisattvo ye sattvā yasmin svārthe kuśale parītte madhye'dhimātre vā śakyarūpāḥ samādāpayituṃ yena copāyena śakyarūpāḥ samādāyituṃ tān yathāyogaṃ tatra tathā samādāpayati |
SA20n1319:168: iyaṃ tāvadbodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā arthacaryā |
SA20n1319:170: iha bodhisattvo vipulena sattveṣu kāruṇyāśayena pratyupasthitenārthamācarati |
SA20n1319:172: punarbodhisattvaḥ pravarāyāmagryāyāmapi saṃpadi vartamāno dāsavatpreṣyavadvaśyaputravaccaṇḍāladārakavannīcacitto nihatamadamānāhaṃkāraḥ nāmarthamācarati |
SA20n1319:173: punarbodhisattvo nirāmiṣeṇākṛtrimeṇa ca parameṇa ca premṇā sattvānāmarthamācarati |
SA20n1319:174: punarbodhisattva ātyantikenāpunaḥ pratyudāvartyena maitreṇa cetasā sattvānāmarthamācarati |
SA20n1319:176: yā ca pañcavidhā vahiḥśuddhā yā ca pañcavidhā'ntaḥśuddhā tāṃ sarvāmekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya daśavidhā bodhisattvānāṃ viśuddhā'rthacaryetyucyate |
SA20n1319:178: iha bodhisattvo yasminnarthe yasmin kuśalamūle parān samādāpayati tasminnarthe tasmin kuśalamūla samādāpane tulye vā'dhike vā svayaṃ saṃśikṣyate |
SA20n1319:179: iti yaivaṃ bodhisattvasya paraistulyārthatā iyamucyate samānārthatā |
SA20n1319:180: tāṃ samānārthatāṃ pare vineyā bodhisattvebhya upalabhya dṛḍhaniścayā bhavantyapratyudāvartyāstasmin kuśala [mūla] samādāpane |
SA20n1319:184: yasmādayaṃ bodhisattvo yatraivāsmān sanniyojayati tadevātmanā samudācarati |
SA20n1319:185: tatrāyaṃ jānannahitamasukhaṃ nātmanā samudācarediti na cāsya samānārthasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavanti pare vaktāraḥ |
SA20n1319:186: tvaṃ tāvat svayaṃ na kuśalaṃ samādāya vartase |
SA20n1319:187: kasmāttvaṃ paraṃ kuśale'tyartha samādāpayitavyaṃ vaktavyamavavaditavyaṃ manyase |
SA20n1319:189: asti bodhisattvaḥ paraiḥ samānārtha eva saṃstāṃ samānārthatāṃ pareṣāṃ nopadarśayati |
SA20n1319:193: tatra prathamā koṭi tulyaguṇaprabhāvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvamārge ācāryatvamabhyupagatānāṃ tulyaguṇaprabhāvo bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇatayā guṇān prabhāvañca nopadarśayati |
SA20n1319:194: dvitīyā koṭī hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ gaṃbhīreṣu sthāneṣūttrastānāṃ pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ teṣāmeva sattvānāṃ tenopāyena vinayanārthaṃ sahadhārmikamātmānamupadarśayati |
SA20n1319:195: saṃcintya ā-caṇḍālānām ā-śunāmarthaṃ kartukāma upadravaṃ saṃśamitukāmo vinayitukāma ā-caṇḍālānām āśunāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapadyate |
SA20n1319:196: tṛtīyā koṭī calakuśalamūlasamādānānāṃ vineyānāṃ sthirīkaraṇārthaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samānārthaḥ adhikārtho vā samānārthatāmupadarśayati |
SA20n1319:198: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yacca śīlaṃ vistareṇa yāvadyā ca samānārthatā tatra pāramitābhiradhyātmaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ |
SA20n1319:201: tatra yacca dānamanekavidhaṃ pūrvavadyāvat samānārthatā ityeṣāmanekavidhānāmaprameyāṇāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bodhipākṣikānāṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samudācāro veditavyaḥ |
SA20n1319:205: udāratvādasaṃkliṣṭatvācca śreṣṭhatā niruttaratā asādhāraṇatā ca veditavyā |
SA20n1319:207: tatra sattvābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānadhiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānārabhya tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati na kevalasyātmana evārthe |
SA20n1319:208: tatra vastvabhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ sarvāṇi sarvākārāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samādāya vartate |
SA20n1319:209: tatra kālābhedo yadbodhisattvaḥ satatasamitamanirākṛtaprayogo'nikṣiptadhuro rātrau ca divā vā dṛṣṭe vā dharme tenaiva ca hetunā'bhisaṃparāye'pi tāni dānādīni kuśalamūlāni samudācarati |
SA20n1319:211: iha bodhisattvo muditacittaḥ tān kuśalān dharmānniṣevate na duḥkhī na durmanā avipratisārī bhavati tato nidānam |
SA20n1319:212: punarbodhisattvaḥ paramanapahatya dṛṣṭigatānyanabhiniviśya duścaritenāvyāmiśrāṇi tāni kuśalamūlāni dānādikāni samudācarati |
SA20n1319:213: punarbodhisattvaḥ satkṛtya sarvātmanā teṣveva guṇadarśī sāradarśī śāntadarśī suniścito'parapratyayo'nanyaneyaḥ tān kuśalān dharmān dānādīn samādāya vartate |
SA20n1319:214: punarbodhisattvo na terṣā dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṃṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣate cakravartitvaṃ vā śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā brahmatvaṃ vā nāpi parataḥ pratikāraṃ pratyāśaṃsate |
SA20n1319:216: na sarvalābhasatkāraślokeṣu nāpyantataḥ kāyajīvite'pi niśrito bhavati |
SA20n1319:217: iti ya ebhirākāraiḥ prasādaprāmodyasahagataścāviṣamaśca satkṛpya cāniśritaśca paryavasānānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ |
SA20n1319:220: tatrāśaya śuddhibhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisattvasya uttaptānyacalāni caitāni kuśalamūlāni bhavanti |
SA20n1319:221: tatreyamuttaptatā yadāśayaśuddhasya bodhisattvasya sarve te kuśalā dharmā apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyā bhavanti |
SA20n1319:222: tatreyamacalanatā yadāśayaśuddho bodhisattvo yathā pratilabdhebhyo yathopacitebhyaśca ebhyaḥ kuśalebhyo dharmebhyo na parihīyate |
SA20n1319:224: nānyatra teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātridivānāmatyayātteṣāṃ teṣāmātmabhāvānāṃ samatikramāccandro vā śuklapakṣe pratyupasthite vardhata eva ebhiḥ kuśalairdharmairna [pari] hīyate bodhisattvaḥ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmibyavasthitasya punarbodhisattvasyaikajātipratibaddhasya caramabhavikasya vā ete kuśalā dharmāḥ suviśuddhā veditavyā yeṣāmuttari bodhisattvabhūmau pariśuddhataratā nāsti |
SA20n1319:225: evaṃ tribhiḥ kāraṇaireṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudācāraḥ |
SA20n1319:227: tribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ suviśuddhatā veditavyā dānādīnāṃ samānarthatāvasānānām |
SA20n1319:228: tatra sarvadānasya sarvaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvasamānarthatāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇāyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirvajrasāraśarīratā saddharmacirasthitikatā ca phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:229: tatra duṣkaradānena duṣkaraśīlena yāvadduṣkarasamānārthatayā āsevitayā suviśodhitayā tathāgatasyāpratisamāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgatatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:230: tatra sarvatomukhena dānena sarvatomukhena śīlena vistareṇa yāvatsarvatomukhayā samānārthatayā tathāgatasya sarvataḥ pradhānasattvairdevamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyatvaṃ phalamabhinivartate |
SA20n1319:231: tatra satpuruṣadānasya satpuruṣaśīlasya yāvatsatpuruṣasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya ye kecitsattvā apadā vā [dvipadā vā] catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā'rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino vāsaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagā vā [teṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmagryatvaṃ phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:232: tatra sarvākārasya dānasya [sarvākārasya] śīlasya vistareṇa yāvatsarvākārāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasyāprameyavicitrapuṇyaparigṛhītaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanakāyatā phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:233: tatra vighātārthikadānasya vighātārthikaśīlasya vistareṇa yāvadvighātārthikasamānārthatāyāḥ tathāgatasya bodhimaṇḍa niṣaṇṇasya sarvamārapratyarthikavidhātāviheṭhāvikampanāpratibalanatā phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:234: tatrehāmutrasukhasya dānasya ihāmutrasukhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadihāmutrasukhāyāḥ samānārthatāyāstathāgatasya paramadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisukhaṃ phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:235: tatra viśuddhasya dānasya viśuddhasya śīlasya vistareṇa yāvadviśuddhāyāḥ samānārthaṃtāyā āsevitāyāḥ suviśodhitāyāḥ sakalasaṃpūrṇayāstathāgatasya sarvākārāścatasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ āśrayapariśuddhirālambanapariśuddhiścittapariśuddhirjñānapariśuddhiḥ phalamabhinirvartate |
SA20n1319:237: idamasya bodhisattvasya dānādīnāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ paryantagataṃ phalaṃ niruttaram |
